otherNightReminder: If the Plague Doctor is dead: Replace the Plague Doctor's character token with a not-in-play Minion token and mark it with the 'Is the Plague Doctor' reminder token (that player is still the good Plague Doctor). When this Minion would normally act, the relevant choices are made by the Storyteller.
name: Plague Doctor
ability: If you die, the Storyteller gains a not-in-play Minion ability.

firstNightReminder: Wake all Minions together, allow them to vote by pointing at who they want to babysit Lil' Monsta.
otherNightReminder: Wake all Minions together, allow them to vote by pointing at who they want to babysit Lil' Monsta. Choose a player, that player dies.
name: Lil' Monsta
ability: Each night, Minions choose who babysits Lil' Monsta's token & "is the Demon". Each night*, a player might die. [+1 Minion]
